statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 100
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount < 50
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE affiliate_id = 2
SELECT sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_id FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE affiliate_id = 5 ORDER BY sale_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_id DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT sale_id, affiliate_id, product_id, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount < 500 ORDER BY affiliate_id, sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 2000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%' AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sd.product_name, am.campaign_name FROM SalesData sd INNER JOIN AffiliateMarketing am ON sd.sale_id = am.sale_id WHERE am.commission > 50;
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount, MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount FROM SalesData;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(commission) AS total_commission FROM AffiliateMarketing GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_commission > 1000 ORDER BY total_commission DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM affiliate_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM affiliate_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT sales_data.sale_id, sales_data.product_name, performance_metrics.clicks, performance_metrics.revenue FROM sales_data JOIN performance_metrics ON sales_data.sale_id = performance_metrics.campaign_id WHERE performance_metrics.clicks > 100 ORDER BY performance_metrics.revenue DESC;

SELECT sales_data.sale_id, sales_data.product_name, performance_metrics.conversions FROM sales_data LEFT JOIN performance_metrics ON sales_data.sale_id = performance_metrics.campaign_id WHERE performance_metrics.conversions IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM SalesDataRecordings;
SELECT campaign_id, sales_amount, recorded_at FROM SalesDataRecordings WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM AffiliateCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT performance_id, campaign_id, clicks, conversions FROM AffiliatePerformance WHERE clicks > 50 AND conversions > 10;
SELECT revenue_id, campaign_id, revenue_amount FROM RevenueTracking WHERE recorded_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SalesDataRecordings ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesDataRecordings GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM AffiliateCampaigns INNER JOIN AffiliatePerformance ON AffiliateCampaigns.campaign_id = AffiliatePerformance.campaign_id ORDER BY clicks DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM AffiliateCampaigns INNER JOIN RevenueTracking ON AffiliateCampaigns.campaign_id = RevenueTracking.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_revenue < 10000;
SELECT * FROM SalesDataRecordings WHERE sales_amount > 1000 AND recorded_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM affiliate_campaigns WHERE budget >= 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT affiliate_id, clicks, revenue FROM affiliate_performance WHERE revenue > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, conversions, revenue FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY conversions DESC, revenue DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_id ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM affiliate_campaigns WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date, budget DESC;
SELECT sale_id, campaign_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM campaign_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, clicks, conversions, revenue, date FROM affiliate_performance WHERE date = '2022-09-15' ORDER BY conversions DESC, revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 10000 ORDER BY revenue DESC, clicks ASC;
